data.eml:eml: New species of Rissoidae (Mollusca, Gastropoda) from the Archipelago of the Azores (northeast Atlantic) with an updated regional checklist for the family

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cordeiro, Ricardo, Avila, Sergio P. (2015): New species of Rissoidae (Mollusca, Gastropoda) from the Archipelago of the Azores (northeast Atlantic) with an updated regional checklist for the family. ZooKeys 480: 1-19, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.480.8599, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.480.8599
